comment.body: Okay, so can we delete it?

pull_request.title: Add sig api with picnic
pull_request.body:
This pull request proposes a new signature API modeled after the kex api, and adds the [Picnic](https://github.com/Microsoft/Picnic) signature scheme.

Picnic must currently be downloaded and set up (to generate parameters) using a script (download-and-setup-picnic.sh). We can migrate to a git submodule at a later time, after this PR is reviewed. 

The Visual Studio build has not yet been modified to support Picnic; this will be done after this PR is reviewed.

repo.name: liboqs
repo.description: C library for quantum-safe cryptographic algorithms

repo.name: liboqs
repo.description: C library for quantum-resistant cryptographic algorithms.
